title: Why I Like Using the MVC Paradigm
content: I like using MVC because it makes the code cleaner and easier to understand.

title: Why I hate Duplicated Code in Programming
content: I hate it when people duplicate code in computer programs because the duplicate code clutters the program and causes the developers to waste time trying to understand it.

title: Why I Like Adding Comments to Computer Code
content: I like adding comments to code because I find it fun to explain to other people how my programs work.

title: Why I Don't Enjoy Writing HTML and CSS as Much as JavaScript
content: JavaScript allows me to think more logically, while writing HTML and CSS requires more creativity
